title: Environmental Emission Type Vocabulary
description: Controlled vocabulary for types of emissions, discharges, and releases relevant to environmental reporting.

terms.label: Greenhouse Gas Emission
terms.definition: Emissions of greenhouse gases, such as CO2, CH4, or N2O, relevant to climate reporting and regulation.

terms.label: Air Pollutant Emission
terms.definition: Emissions of regulated air pollutants, such as NOx, SO2, PM, or VOCs, impacting local or regional air quality.

terms.label: Water Discharge
terms.definition: Discharges of pollutants to surface or groundwater bodies, including organic matter, nutrients, or hazardous substances.

terms.label: Waste Release
terms.definition: Releases of solid or hazardous waste to land, including accidental releases and unauthorized disposal events.

terms.label: Noise or Vibration
terms.definition: Emissions of noise or vibration at levels relevant to environmental or community impact assessments.

terms.label: Other Environmental Emission or Release
terms.definition: An emission or release type that does not fit another, more specific category in this vocabulary.
